title: Two Bedroom Penthouse W/Wrap Around Balcony in Luxury Highrise DTLA!
map_address: 900 South Figueroa Street near West 9th Street
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 52', 'OR Text', '52', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1609 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Located in Downtown Los Angeles, our high-rise apartment homes offer the perfect combination of sophistication, tranquility and convenience in an unparalleled location.', 'Relax and unwind at home while enjoying the chic finishes of our studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom residences.', 'Take advantage of the resort-style amenities throughout the property.', 'Discover a new dimension of living at APEX.', 'The One', 'Features:', 'Complete Appliance package, Gas Range, Expansive views of downtown and west Los Angeles, Spacious Studio, 1, 2 and 3 Bedroom Residences,', 'Recessed Lighting Throughout, Fully- Equipped Kitchens, In-Home Washer & Dryer, Parking, Window Coverings, Air Conditioning, Caesar Stone Countertops*, Expansive 10 to 14 ft Ceilings, Wood Flooring', '* Only available in select apartments', 'Community Amenities:', "Resident Lounge Featuring a Media Room, 24-Hour On-site Concierge, Resident Guest Suite, On-site Maintenance, Outdoor Multi-speaker Audio System, Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply), Firepits & BBQ Deck, Complimentary' Coffee Bar, Package Receiving, Yoga and Zumba Classes", 'On-site, Executive Business Center & Conference Room, Professional On-site Management, Remote Controlled Access Gates *, Flat Screen TVs, Billiards Table and Movie Theater, Concierge, Recycling, Top-of-the-Line Fitness Center with Towel Service, Reserved parking Available*, Elevator, On-site Management, Gate, Short Term Leases Available - Call for Details!, Wi-Fi Access in Common Areas, Lounge, Business Center, Fitness Center, Resort-Inspired pool with Expansive Sundeck, Movie Theater with Apple TV & Blu Ray player, BBQ/picnic Area, Group Exercise, Dog Run/Bark park, Resident Lounge Available To Rent For Parties, Pool, Bike Racks, Dry Cleaning Service Available, Short Term Lease', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply)', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'Greystar California, Inc., Broker License #01525765', 'DMCA Agent: <URL>', 'lXDP5iDt']
